title: Submission of Orders imposed under provisions of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 for approval of Parliament
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to submit the following orders issued	under sections 2 and 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 for	approval of Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2308/17 dated 2022‑11‑30.

*	Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2313/34 dated 2023‑01‑04.

*	Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2316/28 dated 2023‑01‑25.

*	Order under sections 2 and 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007	published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2320/04 dated 2023‑02‑20.

*	Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2321/76 dated 2023‑03‑04.

*	Order under section 2 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2322/20 dated 2023‑03‑07.

*	Order under section 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007 published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2322/21 dated 2023-03-07.

*	Order under sections 2 and 5 of the Special Commodity Levy Act, No.48 of 2007	published in the Gazette Extraordinary No.2323/40 dated 2023‑03‑17.
